mean_cn: v. 蹒跚，颤巍巍地行进
mean_en: a leafless annual parasitic vine of the genus Cuscuta having whitish or yellow filamentous stems; obtain nourishment through haustoria
short_phrase: The old man dodders over to us.
sentence: The old man doddered over to us with his cane.
sentence_trans: 这位老人拄着拐杖，蹒跚的走向我们。
